p: All data were analysed by the software SPSS 19.0 and Origin 7.5, and LC 50 values were determined using the method of Probit. Heart rate was determined as the average value ± standard deviation (x ± s). The t-test was used to compare two groups, and ANOVA was used to compare all groups. Differences with a p < 0.05 were deemed statistically significant.
